title: Online Learning Course Based on Community Public Health Research

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic public health concepts (not required)
context.additional_context: Practical online learning environment focused on solving community health issues, strengthening public health competencies through step-by-step research process activities.

learning_goals: Learners can design community health issue survey questionnaires with over 80% accuracy
Learners can revise and improve public health research protocol drafts three or more times using online collaboration tools
By week 16, learners can submit one actionable proposal for improving community health
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
